articles.author: Rob Bailey-Millado
articles.title: Type 2 diabetes on track to surge 700% in young Americans: CDC issues 'wake-up call' - New York Post
articles.description: “Startling” new alert from the CDC and National Institutes of Health: “It’s vital that we focus our efforts.”
articles.content: The number of young Americans with Type 2 diabetes is projected to skyrocket nearly 700% by 2060 if current upward trends continue unchecked, according to a “startling” new report from the Centers fo… [+2514 chars]
